pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Gavv (2024, TV show)$(br2)Used to access Gavv's $(l:gavv/riders/gavv#gurucan)Gurucan$(/l) form
Obtained by eating $(l:misc/items/lollipop)Lollipops$(/l) or $(l:ride_kamens/items/candy)Nourishing Candy S$(/l) with a $(l:gavv/items/blank_gochizo)Blank Gochizo$(/l) in your inventory
